sentences.en: a vociferous critic of the president's stance
sentences.cn: 猛烈批评总统所持态度的人

sentences.en: a vociferous opponent of the plan
sentences.cn: 这项计划的激烈反对者

sentences.en: And one by one, encouraged by vociferous applause, speaking with fire and enthusiasm and excited gestures, they replied to the attack.
sentences.cn: 他们一个个受到喧闹的欢呼鼓掌的鼓励，怀着火焰和激情，打着激动的手势，回答了对他们的攻击。

sentences.en: He understands immediately is how to a responsibility, vociferous path: " What person are you? "
sentences.cn: 他马上明白是怎么回事, 大声叫道: “ 你是什么人? ”

sentences.en: He was a vociferous opponent of Conservatism.
His resentment of her behaviour was becoming more vociferous.
sentences.cn: 他越来越大声地表达对她行为的厌恶。

sentences.en: New World plover ( Charadrius vociferous ) a distinctive noisy cry and two black bands across its breast.
sentences.cn: 一种西半球的鸻 ( 双领鸻 ) 有独特的吵闹的叫声,在它的胸部有两道黑纹.

sentences.en: She then vociferous rise: " Day, somebody stole my purse! "
sentences.cn: 她于是大声叫了起来: “ 天啊, 有人偷了我的钱包! ”

sentences.en: That journalist is always a vociferous critic of the president's stance.
sentences.cn: 那名记者对总统所持的态度,向来都是猛烈批评的.

sentences.en: The bill had to be withdrawn in response to vociferous and widespread objection.
sentences.cn: 在一片鼎沸的反对声中,这个法案只得收了回去.

sentences.en: The crowds at stations were growing enormous , their greetings more vociferous.
sentences.cn: 车站上的人群越聚越多, 他们欢迎和问候的话音更加喧嚣.

sentences.en: The crowds at the station were growing enormous , their greetings more vociferous.
sentences.cn: 车站上的人群越聚越多, 他们欢迎和问候的话音更加喧嚣了.

sentences.en: Theatre lobbies were filled with a vociferous crowd during the intermission.
sentences.cn: 剧场大厅放映间隙,人群中发出喧闹的嘈杂声.

sentences.en: There was also a vociferous tunnel party.
sentences.cn: 当然,也有一些人嚷嚷着要修建跨海隧道.

sentences.en: They became more vociferous, and some of them began calling out what they thought of Hanna.
sentences.cn: 他们变得更加吵闹了，一些人开始叫嚷着对汉娜的看法。

sentences.en: They were supported by a vociferous group in the union.
sentences.cn: 一群吵吵嚷嚷的工会人员为他们撑腰.

trans.tran_cn: 吵吵嚷嚷的，大声叫喊的，叫嚣的
trans.tran_en: expressing your opinions loudly and strongly
